title: Sequoia Translation
headline: Headline to go in the hero

columns.title: Editing
columns.text: Some clients wish to refine their writing, such as to adapt or enhance the tone and writing style for specific audiences, simplify it to ease understanding, and raise the level of professionalism. We refine written work from many business sectors and tailor them to suite a wide range of readers.

blocks.title: Services
blocks.text: We specialize in translating and refining a wide range of professional, business, legal, educational and technical writing.

blocks.title: Proofreading
blocks.text: All of our translations are reviewed and refined by a native English speaker and US lawyer with over 25 years of experience working internationally as a general counsel for major global corporations and technology ventures..

columns.title: Translation
columns.text:
Our proofreading works to ensure the accuracy and consistency of a document's syntax, spelling, grammar, punctuation and formatting. 

We can perform this independently or as part of our editing services.

hero: Experts in high quality Japanese - English translation, editing and proofreading
about: We specialise in translating and refining a wide range of professional, business, legal, educational and technical writing.

blockOneText: Some clients wish to refine their writing, such as to adap or enhance the tone and writing style for specific audiences, simplify it to ease understanding, and raise the level of professionalism. We refine written work from many business sectors and tailor them to suite a wide range of readers.
blockTwoText: All of our translations are reviewed and refined by a native English speaker and US lawyer with over 25 years of experience working internationally as a general counsel for major global corporations and technology ventures..
blockThreeText:
Our proofreading works to ensure the accuracy and consistency of a document's syntax, spelling, grammar, punctuation and formatting. 

We can perform this independently or as part of our editing services.
servicesText: We specialize in translating and refining a wide range of professional, business, legal, educational and technical writing.
blockFourText: We first confirm any cultural sensibilities, nuances and formalities which clients may want to be conveyed. We confirm the target audience and any requirements such as the tone, style and format that are to be reflected in the work.
blockFiveText: We're a team of professional, native Japanese and English speakers, with a deep understanding of Japanese culture and international business and years of experience in drafting, editing and teaching the skill of drafting high quality writing.
blockSixText:
Dissatisfaction is not an option. If you are not fully satisfied with our work, we will revise it at no extra charge. 

If you are still unhappy, we will provide a full refund
text: Experts in high quality Japanese - English translation, editing and proofreading
